reasoning: DKA is an acute metabolic emergency primarily in type 1 diabetes. Global incidence estimated at ~5 per 100k person-years based on diabetes registry data and epidemiological studies. Higher in developed countries (10-20 per 100k) but lower globally when accounting for lower diabetes burden in developing regions.
source: IDF Diabetes Atlas 2005; Klingensmith GJ et al. (2007). Diabetic ketoacidosis in children. Pediatr Clin North Am. 54(4):623-634
